long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Edify is distraction-free, new-tab extension that brings you a new scripture and a taste of God's beauty *every day*.

I created this extension because it's something that I desired to have in my own technological lifestyle. Enjoy it!

This plugin is free. If you'd like to support me, you're welcome to buy me a coffee:
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kenpercimoney

For more information or feature requests, email kendal@firstiimpression.com
